attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simon Cowell should be granted a knighthood for his outstanding contribution to the TV & music industry. He has promoted British talent both at home & abroad & does a lot of charity work especially for underprivileged & sick children.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
